tweet:
@CBP, border patrol, and local law enforcement have real challenges. 
In the below picture I am carrying a pack of drugs from a smuggler that was confiscated on our unprotected border between points of entry. @cc_sheriff pic.twitter.com/FKAEhBLdYT

Today I met with Cochise County Sheriff Mark Dannels and the team he has protecting the border. Local law enforcement is utilizing advanced technologies and creative ideas to stop human smugglers and drug mules. They are a model of what Americans can do. Thank you,  @cc_sheriff pic.twitter.com/8b7585inF9
Earlier today I toured the U.S. -Mexico border in the El Paso and New Mexico area. Watch my latest update here: pic.twitter.com/9bVZ7cnFXQ

I just gave a Facebook live update from the U.S. - Mexico border.  Watch here:
 https://www.facebook.com/RepRiggleman/videos/vb.286142075437810/437243940223511/?type=2&theater&notif_t=page_post_reaction&notif_id=1564501648903246 …
Tonight I went on a ride-along with @CBP Border Patrol. pic.twitter.com/XGR4HgE5Sl

The brave men and women of @CBP and @ICEgov have been put in impossible positions and have performed admirably. The conditions at the facilities I saw today were nothing like they have been portrayed in the media. Here are pictures of some of the amenities offered pic.twitter.com/48pbV0J25W

Border patrol agents have taken us into the Rio Grande riverbed. You can see Mexican border guards along the border that have started reducing the immigration flow thanks to @POTUS’s negotiations.  These policies also protect our @CBP agents.  #borderpatrol pic.twitter.com/YHhx3HueZj
Today I am visiting the southern border near the El Paso and New Mexico segment. Just ran into U.S. Border Patrol agent Thad and his mustang, Chip! pic.twitter.com/YadpVpRoLb
This week I am taking a trip to our southern border to learn about everything going on at the border and see what we need to do in Congress to address this crisis. pic.twitter.com/DFKIPM9DF2
Thank you, @AIPAC for the invite and thank you @RepElaineLuria for the great discussion. https://twitter.com/AIPAC/status/1155804070113894401 …

This morning I joined my colleagues to hand-wash the Vietnam Veterans Memorial.  It was a tremendous honor to participate in this Vietnam Memorial cleaning, when we in Congress can show our respect and gratitude. Thank you @RepMichaelWaltz for leading this effort. pic.twitter.com/KPwxFOkhe4

This afternoon I introduced the Federal Reserve Accountability and Justification Act. This bill requires the Federal Reserve to meet transparency requirements before substantially changing any existing payment service. 
#fasterpayments
